Author: wistar_rat
Text: This is the exact one I have and second the recommendation. I even use it to weigh my cats and it's identical to the readings I get at the vet office lol.

Author: SpiritedStrawberry
Text: I use this guy:  https://www.amazon.com/Etekcity-Digital-Bathroom-Technology-Included/dp/B00F3J9G1W/ref=sr_1_6_s_it?s=hpc&ie=UTF8&qid=1548693917&sr=1-6&keywords=scale  I've tested it with weights every few weeks and it's still incredibly accurate.
